description: The content of the drawer. It's usually the DrawerContent.

type: xs | sm | md | lg | xl | 2xl | 3xl | 4xl | 5xl | full

description: Whether the drawer is open by default (controlled).
Whether the drawer is open by default (uncontrolled).
Whether the drawer can be closed by clicking on the overlay or pressing the Esc key.
Whether pressing the Esc key to close the drawer should be disabled.
Whether the drawer should block the scroll of the page on open.
Whether to hide the drawer close button.
Custom close button to display on top right corner.
The props to modify the framer motion animation. Use the variants API to create your own animation.
The container element in which the overlay portal will be placed.
Whether the drawer should not have animations.
Allows to set custom class names for the drawer slots.
